name: Soccer Penalty Series 3D
description:
It’s the decisive moment when everything depends on you! Complete a full series of shootouts and lead your team to victory!


Adjust the speed, angle and trajectory of the ball and choose the right moment to kick it straight into the goal.
Set your own record and show the best result!

Enjoy:
- one tap gameplay
- simple yet addictive football mini-game
- get ready for your own Championship!

Your team is counting on you!
